## Introduction
OpenBar() season! I had an amazing time being on a joint panel of the Android254 and Kotlin Kenya communities 
hosted by Frank Tamre and Kendi Jackie.

Together with Michael Bukachi, Beatrice Kinya, Wachira Nicholas Nduati, Adhiambo Peres, and Ronnie Otieno, 
we engaged in dynamic discussions addressing a wide range of topics. These included career development, 
navigating the job market and professional landscape, Jetpack Compose, continuous learning, 
emerging trends in Android development, design challenges for the mobile world, and our aspirations for 2022.
